name: ScarCrow
description:
**THIS IS A COPY** if you want the official game then go to; https://sentryturbo.itch.io/scarecrow-co-op-2 Please go check it out if you slightly enjoyed this game. I am NOT connected with the developers of this game, i created it to test my skills at making games and to show how obsessed i am with this game.

What's New?: New Character Added: Screachers, Footsteps SFX, Big Light, Gun Shots SFX, Main Menu Controls.
